name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior IP Engineer with 13+ years of experience in routing, switching, and firewall management in high-performance network environments. Highly skilled in **CISCO** technologies, including **ACI** and **Stateful Firewalls**, with hands-on expertise in devices from **Juniper**, **Checkpoint**, and **Fortinet**. Proficient in automation and scripting using **Ansible**, **Python**, and **Bash** to streamline network operations and enhance security protocols.
Experienced in deploying complex network configurations and troubleshooting with a focus on IPv6 and 5G technologies. Strong technical problem-solving abilities and analytical skills, ensuring optimal network performance and compliance with industry standards. Fluent in English, effectively communicating with teams and stakeholders from diverse backgrounds.

experience.responsibilities:
- Designed and implemented robust **routing** and **switching** solutions for high-availability networks, utilizing **CISCO**, **Juniper**, and **Fortinet** technologies.
- Automated network configurations and management tasks with **Ansible** and **Python**, resulting in a **30%** increase in operational efficiency.
- Developed and managed cutting-edge **firewall** configurations using **Stateful Firewalls**, **Checkpoint**, and **F5**, ensuring security compliance and risk mitigation.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues, leveraging expert **analytical skills** and **technical problem-solving** capabilities.
- Fostered a proactive approach to network **automation**, optimizing performance for next-generation **5G** environments and **IPv6** infrastructure.
- Engaged in continuous learning and obtained relevant **CISCO certifications**, enhancing expertise and team knowledge transfer.
- Conducted regular performance audits and assessments, leading to a **15%** reduction in network latency via efficient **routing** and configuration optimization.
- Developed detailed documentation and best practice guidelines for network deployment processes, ensuring clarity and compliance across teams.
- Demonstrated fluent communication skills in **English**, enabling effective stakeholder engagement and collaborative discussions on network design and implementation.

- Leveraged **Python** and **Bash** scripting to automate network configuration and management, improving efficiency by **30%**.
- Implemented and optimized **CISCO** ACI for enhanced network routing and switching capabilities, resulting in reduced latency by **20%**.
- Designed and deployed stateful **firewalls** from **Checkpoint**, **Fortinet**, and **Juniper** to secure network infrastructure, achieving a **99.9%** uptime.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues, utilizing strong analytical skills and technical problem-solving abilities.
- Achieved **CISCO** certifications, expanding knowledge in advanced networking concepts and improving team expertise.
- Automated the deployment of network devices using **Ansible**, streamlining operations and reducing manual effort by **40%**.
- Conducted performance testing and monitoring, focusing on **IPv6** and **5G** technologies to ensure optimal network performance and reliability.
- Created documentation and training materials to assist in onboarding new engineers and enhancing team capabilities in network automation and management.

• Demonstrated technical problem-solving skills by troubleshooting routing and switching issues in large-scale e-commerce environments utilizing **CISCO**, **Juniper**, and **Fortinet** technologies.
• Automated network configurations and deployments using **Ansible** to improve efficiency and reliability across **5G** and **IPv6** network infrastructures.
• Implemented advanced firewall strategies, leveraging **Stateful Firewalls** from **Checkpoint**, **Fortinet**, and **CISCO**, ensuring robust network security and compliance with industry standards.
• Developed and maintained secure network architectures to facilitate seamless backend service integration across e-commerce platforms, employing **ACI** principles.
• Leveraged **Python** and **Bash** scripting to enhance automation scripts for network monitoring and troubleshooting.
• Ensured high network availability and low latency through strategic routing and switching methodologies.
• Achieved compliance with GDPR by applying role-based access control (RBAC) measures across the network, ensuring data protection and secure admin access.
• Conducted regular analysis and optimization of network configurations to support high-traffic e-commerce operations and enhance user experience.
• Facilitated training and support for team members on network technologies, while ensuring adherence to **CISCO certifications** standards.
• Engaged in ongoing learning to remain current with emerging technologies and best practices in network engineering.
